quote: I am a work in progress.
author: Violet Yates,  Lost & Found

quote: I like work: it fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours.
author: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: Make your work to be in keeping with your purpose
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: It’s not about working for money, it’s about having money work for you.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Hard work is what you do to make ends meet, easy work is getting others to do the hard work for you.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Forget yourself and go to work.
author: Bryant S. Hinckley

quote: Let us realize that: the privilege to work is a gift, the power to work is a blessing, the love of work is success!
author: David O. McKay

quote: The dictionary is the only place that success comes before work. work is the key to success, and hard work can help you accomplish anything.
author: Vince Lombardi Jr.

quote: Work is love made visible. And if you can't work with love, but only with distaste, it is better that you should leave your work and sit at the gate of the temple and take alms of the people who work with joy
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Work harder to appreciate your ordinary day.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: When work is a pleasure, life is a joy! When work is a duty, life is slavery.
author: Maxim Gorky

quote: What I know is, is that if you do work that you love, and the work fulfills you, the rest will come.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: When you have a great and difficult task, something perhaps almost impossible, if you only work a little at a time, every day a little, suddenly the work will finish itself.
author: Karen Blixen

quote: Work is a blessing. God has so arranged the world that work is necessary, and He gives us hands and strength to do it. The enjoyment of leisure would be nothing if we had only leisure. It is the joy of work well done that enables us to enjoy rest, just as it is the experiences of hunger and thirst that make food and drink such pleasures.
author: Elisabeth Elliot,  Discipline: The Glad Surrender

quote: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
author: Stephen King,  On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft

quote: And the only way to do great work is to love what you do.... Don't settle
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Muscles aching to work, minds aching to create - this is man.
author: John Steinbeck,  The Grapes of Wrath

quote: Thought I wanted overnight success, until I achieved it through hard work and the refusal to back down! What you earn, you keep.
author: A.M. Hudson

quote: Amateurs look for inspiration; the rest of us just get up and go to work.
author: Chuck Close

quote: We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves strong. The amount of work is the same.
author: Carlos Castaneda

quote: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: This is the real secret of life -- to be completely engaged with what you are doing in the here and now. And instead of calling it work, realize it is play.
author: Alan W. Watts

quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: We work in the dark - we do what we can - we give what we have. Our doubt is our passion and our passion is our task. The rest is the madness of art.
author: Henry James

quote: Inspiration comes of working every day.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: The question is not how much work are you willing to put in, but what are you willing to take out? Success is sacrifice.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: In the name of God, stop a moment, cease your work, look around you.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Whenever you have taken up work in hand, you must see it to the finish. That is the ultimate secret of success. Never, never, never give up!
author: Dada Vaswani

quote: You are what you do. If you do boring, stupid monotonous work, chances are you'll end up boring, stupid and monotonous. Work is a much better explanation for the creeping cretinization all around us than even such significant moronizing mechanisms as television and education.
author: Bob Black,  The Abolition of Work & Other Essays

quote: You must immerse yourself in your work. You have to fall in love with your work … You must dedicate your life to mastering your skill. That’s the secret of success.
author: Chef Jiro

quote: Work without love is slavery.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: The secret to enjoying your job is to have a hobby that's even worse
author: Bill Watterson,  It's a Magical World

quote: The trick is in what one emphasizes. We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves happy. The amount of work is the same.
author: Carlos Castaneda

quote: To pay attention, this is our endless and proper work.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: If you work just for money, you'll never make it, but if you love what you're doing and you always put the customer first, success will be yours.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: Baby you're a firework, c'mon show 'em what you're worth..."~Firework
author: Katy Perry

quote: So much working, reading, thinking, living to do! A lifetime is not long enough.
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: I don't think about art when I'm working. I try to think about life.
author: Jean-Michel Basquiat

quote: You've achieved success in your field when you don't know whether what you're doing is work or play.
author: Warren Beatty

quote: The secret of my success is that I make other people money. And, never ever, ever, ever be ashamed about trying to earn as much as possible for yourself, if the person you're working with is also making money. That's life!
author: Simon Cowell

quote: But hell, you've gotta work with what you've got.
author: Haruki Murakami,  1Q84

quote: You life matters. You are here for a reason. Your job is to determine why.
author: Michael Hyatt,  Living Forward: A Proven Plan to Stop Drifting and Get the Life You Want

quote: Hard work is only a prison sentence when you lack motivation
author: Malcolm Gladwell,  Outliers: The Story of Success

quote: The public wants work which flatters its illusions.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: The only thing I have learnt over the years is that if you enjoy your work and put in the best efforts, it will show. If you follow this process, things work out. But if you go chasing a formula, success will elude you.
author: Mahesh Babu

quote: The main thing is to writefor the joy of it. Cultivate a work-lustthat imagines its haven like your hands at nightdreaming the sun in the sunspot of a breast.You are fasted now, light-headed, dangerous.Take off from here.
author: Seamus Heaney,  Station Island

quote: A small daily task, if it be really daily, will beat the labours of a spasmodic Hercules.
author: Anthony Trollope

quote: One must work and dare if one really wants to live.
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol
